exceptions.tactic: intros pr I ii A this e i r H.
intros pr' I ii A this e i r H.
intros pr' I' ii A this e i r H.
intros pr' I' ii' A this e i r H.
intros pr' I' ii' A' this e i r H.
intros pr' I' ii' A' this' e i r H.
intros pr' I' ii' A' this' e' i r H.
intros pr' I' ii' A' this' e' i'' r H.
intros pr' I' ii' A' this' e' i'' r'' H.

tactic: apply vrf_pre with (i:=i) (W:=mkWorld pr) (r:=fun x m => I (getS m) (nodes pr (getS m)) -> r x m).
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable r (possible names are: this, W, A, e, i, i' and k).

original: intros pr I ii A this e i r H. unfold verify. simpl. intros H1. apply vrf_pre with (i:=i) (W:=mkWorld pr) (r:=fun x m => I (getS m) (nodes pr (getS m)) -> r x m). apply call_rule'. intros x m H2. apply H1. intros m'. intros H3. apply H2. apply H3. intros x m H2. apply r. apply H2.
